title: Going on holiday 度假
introduction: Listen to the tape then answer this question. Where did Sam go for his holiday this year?
听录音，然后回答问题。今年萨姆去了什么地方度假?

text_and_translation.text: TOM:Hi,Sam. We're having lunch. Do you want to have lunch with us?
text_and_translation.translation: 汤姆：你好，萨姆。我们正在吃午饭。你跟我们一起吃午饭好吗？

text_and_translation.text: SAM: No,thank you,Tom. I've already had lunch. I had lunch at half past twelve.
text_and_translation.translation: 萨姆：不，汤姆，谢谢。我已经吃过饭了。我在12点半吃的。

text_and_translation.text: CAROL:Have a cup of coffee then.
text_and_translation.translation: 卡罗尔：那么喝杯咖啡吧。

text_and_translation.text: SAM: I've just had a cup,thank you. I had one after my lunch.
text_and_translation.translation: 萨姆：我刚喝了一杯，谢谢。我是在饭后喝的。

text_and_translation.text: TOM: Let's go into the living room,Carol. We can have our coffee there.
text_and_translation.translation: 汤姆：我们到客厅里去吧，卡罗尔。我们可以在那里喝咖啡。

text_and_translation.text: CAROL:Excuse the mess,Sam. This room's very untidy. We're packing our suitcases. We're going to leave tomorrow.
text_and_translation.translation: 卡罗尔：屋子很乱，请原谅，萨姆。房间里乱七八糟。我们正在收拾手提箱。明天我们就要走。

text_and_translation.text: TOM: When are you going to have a holiday,Sam?
text_and_translation.translation: 汤姆：萨姆，你准备什么时候去度假？

text_and_translation.text: SAM: I don't know. I've already had my holiday this year.
text_and_translation.translation: 萨姆：我不知道。今年我已度过假了。

notes.title: 现在完成时
notes.describe: 现在完成时主要用于表示过去不确定的时间里发生的并与现在有着某种联系的动作，或表示开始于过去并持续到现在的动作。

notes.title: already
notes.describe: already 通常放在助动词后面，表示动作已经发生。

notes.title: Excuse the mess
notes.describe: 意思是“乱七八糟，请原谅。”

notes.title: stay at home
notes.describe: 呆在家里，注意home之前不加任何冠词。
